description:
My place is centrally located, very close to Subway, Target, Dallas BBQs and Golden Krust plus...Also walking distance from Brooklyn College. You’ll love my place because of the location and the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Very close to restaurants, supermarkets, green grocers, the train(2 and 5) is 2 blocks away.
name: One Bed Apt In Flatbush( NearBrooklyn College)
review:
Andre is a very nice person, always available and kind. He did everything to make us confortable in his apartment.
Unfortunately the building is quite old, so weird noises may disturb your rest. However I really suggest getting in touch with this host!
